metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11396 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ephy-session.c in libephymain.so in GNOME Web (aka Epiphany) through 3.28.2.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via JavaScript code that triggers access to a NULL URL, as demonstrated by a crafted window.open call.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> cosmic and newer fixed in 3.28.2.1-1ubuntu1 mdeslaur> fixed in bionic-updates but not in bionic-security

criterions.comment: epiphany-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
